name: Clojure Source Code File
summary: A CLJ file is a source code file written in Clojure, a dynamic, general-purpose programming language based on Lisp that runs on Java Virtual Machine ( JVM ), JavaScript , and Common Language Runtime (CLR) platforms. It is a compiled language that may be a standalone program containing all the code or one of many files referenced in a development project. Various programs, including Clojure CLI, Boot, and Visual Studio Code (with the Calva plugin ) support CLJ files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Microsoft Visual Studio Code with the Calva plugin
Sublime Text with the Clojure Sublimed or Tutkain plugins

macos.display_name: GNU Emacs with the CIDER plugin
Microsoft Visual Studio Code with the Calva plugin
Sublime Text with the Clojure Sublimed or Tutkain plugins
